p: Quercetin ( 13) and quercetin-3- O-methylether ( 14) were identified in a methanol extract of the aerial parts of E. laurentii ( Ateba et al., 2014b), while 3,4â€²,6,8-tetrahydroxyflavone-7- C-glucoside ( 15) from that extract was identified for the first time in the genus ( Ateba et al., 2016a).
